## Part 2: Prepare the data

```{r}
video_date_col <- videos %>% 
  mutate(video_date=
           dmy(str_extract(title,pattern="[0-9][0-9]\\.[0-9][0-9]\\.[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]")))

video_date_col %>% select(video_date)
```
